title: Cypress on Sauce Course
description: Learn to run Cypress tests on the Sauce Labs Cloud along with saucectl. Run a Cypress test suite you already have on Sauce Labs, or use a sample Cypress test suite to explore the Sauce Labs automated testing features.  With a few quick changes to a config file, you can customeize the environments your tests are run in, then share and analyze your test results on the Sauce Labs App.
